## R Markdown

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r begin to read bigrams, eval = TRUE}
bigram_count <- read.csv(file = "/Users/mutecypher/Documents/Documents - Michael’s iMac/Coursera/Capstone Project/processed/bigram_count.csv", colClasses = c("NULL", NA, NA) )
bi_bigrams <- separate(bigram_count, bigram, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ")
rm(bigram_count)
write.csv(bi_bigrams,file = "/Users/mutecypher/Documents/Documents - Michael’s iMac/Coursera/Capstone Project/processed/bi_bigrams.csv" )
rm(bi_bigrams)
```
